title: Can technology fix fashion's sizing crisis?
description: The BBC looks into whether artificial intelligence (AI) can help people who struggle when clothes are oddly sized.
content:
Most women will relate to the misery of inconsistent sizing in high-street shops.
A pair of jeans could easily be a size 10 by one brand and a size 14 in another, leaving customers confused and disheartened.
It has led to a global deluge of returns, ... [2895 chars]

description: Understand the benefits and fears surrounding Artificial Intelligence (AI) and its potential to replace human jobs in various sectors.

title: Wall Street Week Ahead: Skittish tech stock investors turn to Nvidia results for next cues
description: Investors brace for heightened tech stock volatility. Nvidia's upcoming earnings report is a key event. The company is central to the artificial intelligence trade. Its results will influence the tech sector and beyond. Analysts expect strong growth, but market expectations are high. Any deviation could dent current AI-driven trades. Other sectors are also showing strength.

title: Google To Invest $40 Billion In New Data Centers In Texas
description: Alphabet Inc.’s Google plans to invest $40 billion in three new Texas data centers, part of an effort to add artificial intelligence computing power in a state that’s also drawn multibillion investments from competitors such as OpenAI and Anthropic PBC.

title: Singapore mulls holding top bank execs responsible for AI risks
description: SINGAPORE — Singapore’s central bank has proposed a set of guidelines that will hold the board and senior management of financial institutions responsible for risks that arise from their use of artificial intelligence (AI).
content:

title: Google to invest $40 billion in Texas through 2027
description: (Reuters) -Alphabet's Google said on Friday it would invest $40 billion in three new data centers in Texas through 2027, as the company accelerates efforts to expand capacity for supporting its artificial intelligence ambitions.
content:
(Reuters) -Alphabet's Google said on Friday it would invest $40 billion in three new data centers in Texas through 2027, as the company accelerates efforts to expand capacity for supporting its artificial intelligence ambitions.
